title: Verify your account
description: Complete the verification process to access all services.
complete-previous-level-first: Please complete the previous level first
different-type-started-KYC: You have already started the KYC process as an individual
different-type-started-KYB: You have already started the KYB process as a business
multiple-accounts: At the moment, KYC is only enabled for users with one exchange account
progress-explainer: We're working tirelessly on it, please hold tight. Usually it takes only a few minutes
resubmit-issues: Resubmit your information addressing the issues.

items.proof-of-funds: Proof of Funds Document (Employment Certificate or Bank statement showing sources of income. Please make sure that the document proves a net worth of at least from 100.000 to USD 250,000)

items.cert-of-incumbency: Register of Members or Certificate of Incumbency (should be issued within the last 12 months)

items.cert-of-incorporation: Certificate of Incorporation or a Trade License
items.cert-of-incumbency: Register of Members or Certificate of Incumbency (should be issued within the last 12 months)

items.type-of-business: Type of Business / Nature of Business

requirements-level-2-corp.source-of-funds: Source of Funds (Source of Funds Verification can be copies of latest audited Company Accounts, proof of digital asset balances on other exchanges, or Bank statements showing sources of business revenue. Ensure the uploaded document covers the last 12 months)

modal.title: Start your account verification
modal.description: Start the verification process clicking on the button. You will be redirected to an external page to complete the process.

reminder: Urgent Reminder: KYC Deadline Approaching! <0>Pass your KYC</0>
